twitchchatintegration.chat.resubscribe: %s has subscribed for %d months in a row!
twitchchatintegration.error.read_only_ch: You can not send messages in anonymous mode.
twitchchatintegration.gui.openToken.logI: Log into chat and send messages
twitchchatintegration.gui.openToken.open: The Authentication page will be opened in your browser.
twitchchatintegration.gui.openToken.auth: Authorize Twitch Integration to use your account?
twitchchatintegration.gui.awaitingRespon: Please switch to your web browser and follow the instructions.
twitchchatintegration.gui.no_leak_pls: Please do not show your browser on stream during authorization.
twitchchatintegration.gui.browse_failed_: Use Copy to Clipboard and paste the link into your browser manually.
twitchchatintegration.config.authenticat: Authorize your account to login to Twitch Chat
twitchchatintegration.config.edit_authen: Regenerate your token or switch to anonymous login.
twitchchatintegration.config.channel.del: How the mod should react to deleted messages. Replace will replace deleted messages with <message deleted>.
twitchchatintegration.config.channel.sub: Whether only messages by subscribers should bbe shown ingame. This does not turn on Twitch's subscriber only mode.
twitchchatintegration.config.channel.act: Whether messages for this channel should be received.
